planSelectionPO.hintText:
Max. 20 characters
Appoint a trustee if your beneficiary is a minor or lacks legal capacity and doesn't live in Quebec. If your beneficiary is a minor who lives in Quebec, death benefits will be paid to your beneficiary’s tutor (generally the parents) unless a trust for the minor exists. If a formal trust exists, don't complete this section. Consider getting legal advice before appointing a trustee.
In Quebec, if your spouse (married or civil union) is a beneficiary, you can't remove them without their permission unless you select the revocable checkbox below.
If you’re adding more beneficiaries, make sure the total adds up to 100%.
Max. 60 characters>

beneficiariesDescription.item: Choose who should receive your savings when you pass away. If you don't designate a beneficiary or none of them survive you, the money will go to your estate unless the law requires otherwise.
Generally, you can change your beneficiaries at any time using your online account.

beneficiariesPO.beneficiariesDeleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete Test Testsample?
beneficiariesPO.beneficiariesSkipQuestion: Are you sure you want to continue without adding beneficiaries?
beneficiariesPO.beneficiariesSkipDetails: Naming a beneficiary can help determine where your savings might go in the event of your death.

beneficiariesAdd.expected: The trustee and the beneficiary can't be the same person.

beneficiariesPO.addBeneficiaryHintLabel: All fields are required unless labelled as optional.
beneficiariesPO.primaryTypeLabel: What type of beneficiary do you want to add?
beneficiariesPO.personDropDownQuestion: What’s this person’s relationship to you?

primaryFirstNameInvalid.initial: Enter a valid first name that contains only letters, hyphens, spaces, apostrophes, brackets and periods.

primaryLastNameInvalid.initial: Enter a valid last name that contains only letters, hyphens, spaces, apostrophes, brackets and periods.

primaryAllocation.initial: What percentage do you want to allocate to this beneficiary?

primaryAllocationInvalid.initial: Enter a valid percentage between 1 and 100.

beneficiariesPO.primaryAllocationError: Enter the percentage you'd like to allocate to this beneficiary.
beneficiariesPO.beneficiaryRevocableQuestion: Do you want this beneficiary to be revocable? (optional)

beneficiariesDuplicateError.expected: You've already added a primary beneficiary with the same first name, last name and relationship to you.

beneficiariesPO.beneficiariesDuplicateError: You've already added a primary beneficiary with the same first name, last name and relationship to you.
beneficiariesPO.beneficiariesAllocationError: Edit your allocations for primary beneficiaries so that they add up to 100%.

beneficiaryTrusteePO.primaryTrusteeQuestion: Does this beneficiary require a trustee?

primaryTrusteeSelectionNo.initial: Select if this beneficiary requires a trustee.

primaryTrusteeRelationship.initial: What's the trustee's relationship to you?

beneficiaryTrusteePO.primaryTrusteeRelationshipError: Select the trustee's relationship to you.

primaryTrusteeFirstNameInvalid.initial: Enter a valid first name that contains only letters, hyphens, spaces, apostrophes, brackets and periods.

primaryTrusteeLastNameInvalid.initial: Enter a valid last name that contains only letters, hyphens, spaces, apostrophes, brackets and periods.

beneficiariesAdd.expected: The trustee and the beneficiary can't be the same person.
